prompts: Create a steel-type Pokemon with a spiky design and a green accent.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a plant with metallic textures and vibrant colors.
Generate an image of a defensive Pokemon made of steel with unique botanical features.
Make a quirky Pokemon with a round body and multiple green appendages.
Imagine a Pokemon that blends nature and machinery, showcasing iron and plant elements.
Design a Pokemon that has a tough exterior but a friendly demeanor, surrounded by nature.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in forests, with a body shaped like a steel ball.
